data.name: Smooth Operators 2 Demo
data.detailed_description:
Welcome back to Smooth Operators 2!

Smooth Operators is an advanced simulation where you take control of a Customer Service company and lead it to financial success! Hire employees and customize your buildings with different types of offices, facilities and accessories! Watch your company come alive and grow while your building reach the sky.

Smooth Operators 2 offers a deeper simulation, where focus is put not only on balancing operational workloads, but all aspects of running a functional outsourced Customer Experience operation. The building mechanic is reimagined to allow the player to create a very dynamic, organic and unique office building. All characters classes - not only Agents - have a clear objective in the game, and the player needs to balance and satisfy more workloads each day, as well as developing the business in a controlled fashion. The game also includes a new Research system that the player can prioritize how the player sees fit.

But managing your Customer Experience company won’t be an easy task! Employees will get upset if you don’t consider their well-being. You need to balance your staffing to handle all types of workloads that comes with building a company.

Smooth Operators 2 also offers a unique interface - an intelligent NLP/AI driven chat functionality with Jill the receptionist, who serves as your guide through the game.

This demo is a full vertical slice of the game, but with some time restraints as well as feature restraints.

There might still be bugs in the build, and please use either the discord server or the Demo Feedback community page. =)

data.short_description: Smooth Operators is a tycoon/simulator game where you are the Building Architect, Hiring Manager, and Business Developer! Build and organic building, Hire employees, and manage your own customer service company and lead it to financial success! But for gods sake - Keep your employees happy!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 or better
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
